Class EnvContainerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.internal.EnvContainerInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContainerInfo, ResourceCapability

    public final class EnvContainerInfo
extends Object
implements ContainerInfo
    A ContainerInfo based on information on the environment.
